name: the CakePHP 2.x version of this awesome list
this wiki with a list of not-yet upgraded plugins
AssetCompress plugin
description: A complete asset manager for CakePHP.

name: Less plugin
description: Less parser plugin for CakePHP.

name: MinifyHtml plugin
description: Compress HTML output.

name: AuditStash plugin
description: Flexible and rock solid audit log tracking.

name: Muffin/Footprint plugin
description: Plugin to allow passing currently logged in user to model layer.

name: Version plugin
description: A plugin that facilitates versioned database entities.

name: ADmad/HybridAuth plugin
description: A plugin which allows using the HybridAuth social sign on library with CakePHP.

name: ADmad/JwtAuth plugin
description: A plugin for authenticating using JSON Web Tokens.

name: FriendsOfCake/Authenticate plugin
description: Authentication classes for AuthComponent.

name: CookieAuth plugin
description: A simple Cake 3 plugin to automatically authenticate users with Cookies.

name: HierAuth plugin
description: A CakePHP plugin for hierarchical, role based, simple authorization.

name: Muffin/OAuth2 plugin
description: OAuth2 authentication using the league/oauth2-client.

name: MultiTenant plugin
description: Easily build SaaS enabled web applications.

name: TinyAuth plugin
description: Role based (single/multi) authentication as very light-weight approach.

name: Tools:Passwordable
description: Containing Passwordable behavior for a DRY approach on password hashing.

name: TwoFactorAuth plugin
description: Allows two factor authentication using Google Authenticator or similar app to generate one-time codes. Based on RobThree/TwoFactorAuth library.

name: UserPermissions plugin
description: Allow groups of users or single users to view a specific page.

name: Users plugin
description: Complete user management (admin panel, remember me, etc), Facebook/Twitter login, RBAC, API and more.

name: Cache plugin
description: For caching views (HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, ...) as static cache files.

name: NewRelic plugin
description: Using New Relic for analysis and monitoring.

name: Airbrake plugin A plugin to seamlessly integrate Airbrake with CakePHP for errors and exceptions.
DebugKit plugin
description: The de-facto standard for debugging.

name: Gourmet/Whoops plugin
description: PHP error for cool kids with filp/whoops.

name: Setup plugin
description: A lightweight setup plugin containing debugging and maintenance tools.

name: PipingBag plugin
description: Dependency injection container plugin that adds the ability to configure object instances and their dependencies before they are used, and to store them into a container class for easy access.

name: Gourmet/Email plugin
description: Email helper, layout and more.

name: Enviroments plugin
description: Plugin to handle enviroments.

name: Gourmet/Aroma plugin
description: Database based configuration.

name: Settings plugin
description: A plugin to manage your settings via your database.

name: Setup plugin
description: Plugin to handle very basic environments.

name: FileStorage plugin
description: Abstract file storage and upload plugin.

name: FlyPie plugin
description: Abstract filesystem access using Flysystem.

name: Image plugin
description: Image behavior that works much like Cake's built in TranslateBehavior.

name: Josegonzalez/Upload plugin
description: A customisable plugin that uses Flysystem to write to multiple backends (Dropbox, FTP, S3, Local, etc.).

name: Proffer plugin
description: A customisable upload plugin with thumbnail generation.

name: Upload plugin
description: A little plugin to upload file.

name: Gourmet/Filters plugin
description: Extra dispatcher filters (maintenance, robots, ip, etc).

name: Gourmet/Validation plugin
description: Extra validation providers (Respect, IsoCodes, etc.) and rules.

name: HtmlPurifier plugin
description: Purifier Plugin that features a trait, behavior and helper to allow you to get sanitization and filtering where you need it. You can configure multiple sets of filter rules as well.

name: HtmlPurifier plugin
description: Purifier Plugin Behavior that cleanses data before it is marshaled into the entity and/or before saving.

name: Geo plugin
description: Containing Geocoder behavior and GoogleMapsV3 helper.

name: ADmad/I18n plugin
description: A plugin with I18n related tools.

name: Localized plugin
description: Localized validation and ready-to-use translation PO files.

name: ShadowTranslate plugin
description: A plugin with shadow table based replacement for core's Translate behavior.

name: Transifex plugin
description: Managing i18n PO files and translations via Transifex API.

name: Translation plugin
description: Extract pot files, translate string (manually, google, community), export translations to pot files.

name: ADmad/Glide plugin
description: A plugin for using Glide image manipulation library.

name: Imagine plugin
description: An image manipulation plugin and wrapper around Imagine.

name: Aura.Intl
description: A powerful I18n library - used in CakePHP3.x core.

name: Capcake
description: Deploy CakePHP applications using Capistrano.

name: Carbon
description: A simple DateTime API extension - used in CakePHP3.x core (deprecated soon).

name: Chronos
description: A simple standalone DateTime API extension (successor of Carbon).

name: Composer Installers
description: A multi framework Composer library installer.

name: Composer/Packagist
description: A package and dependency manager.

name: Graphviz
description: A Graphviz library.

name: Jenkins
description: The free alternative for private (GitHub) repos.

name: Rocketeer
description: PHP task runner and deployment package.

name: Travis CI
description: A continuous integration platform - de-facto standard for testing (GitHub) repos.

name: YamlRoute
description: Configure routes with simple YAML files.

name: Gourmet/CommonMark plugin
description: Adds CommonMark Markdown parsing.

name: Markup plugin
description: Allows to use PHP or JS based syntax highlighting.

name: Execution order
description: A 3.x test app to display the execution order of files, methods and callbacks.

name: Migrations plugin
description: (DB) Migration plugin.

name: Upgrade app
description: Official upgrade app for 2.x=>3.x.

name: Upgrade/Migration Guide
description: Official migration guide.

name: Ajax plugin
description: A plugin to ease handling AJAX requests.

name: CakeAdmin plugin
description: A non-stable user management plugin with a built-in admin area.

name: CurrencyConverter plugin
description: A plugin to convert currency into another one.

name: Dashboard plugin
description: Build beautiful dashboards for your cakes.

name: Hashid plugin
description: Allows to use hashids to not expose the database ids to the user.

name: Setup:Maintenance
description: Maintenance shell to go into maintenance mode for all requests with optional IP whitelisting.

name: Shim plugin
description: A plugin containing useful shims and improvements as basis for your application.

name: Tools plugin
description: Containing lots of useful libs, helpers, behaviors, components, shells and more.

name: Travis
description: Easy travis setup for CakePHP plugins.

name: UserTools plugin
description: User tools for login, registration, password reset and more. Works out of the box CRUD like and is highly configurable.

name: Utils plugin
description: Containing useful components (Authorizer, Menu) and behaviors (WhoDidIt, Uploadable, Metas, Stateable).

name: Wrench plugin
description: Maintenance Mode plugin. Easily extensible and customizable.

name: Yaml plugin
description: For using YAML config files instead of PHP arrays.

name: KnpMenu plugin
description: A menu plugin based on the Knp Menu Library.

name: Notifier plugin
description: A plugin that makes creating and reading notifications easy.

name: ADmad/Sequence plugin
description: Behavior for maintaining ordered list of records.

name: Duplicatable plugin
description: Behavior for duplicating entities including related data.

name: Money plugin
description: Money data type for CakePHP entities using sebastianbergmann/money.

name: Muffin/Orderly plugin
description: Allows setting default order for your tables.

name: Muffin/Trash plugin

name: PersistRelatedData plugin
description: Behavior for persisting selected fields of related models.

name: RowLocker plugin
description: Exclusive locks for rows in your tables.

name: Webservices ORM plugin
description: An ORM like interface for webservices.

name: CakePdf plugin
description: A plugin around PDF generation.

name: CakeResque plugin
description: A plugin for Resque, a library for creating background jobs.

name: Queue plugin
description: A minimal dependency-free CakePHP only plugin around Queue.

name: Cors plugin
description: A lightweight plugin for adding CORS headers to specified endpoints.

name: Swagger plugin
description: Swagger plugin for documenting your CakePHP 3.x APIs.

name: ElasticSearch plugin
description: Alternative ORM using Elastic Search as its backend.

name: Muffin/Tags plugin
description: For tagging and finding tagged records.

name: PlumSearch plugin
description: Search plugin implements custom, flexible and extendable search strategies. Implements PRG pattern.

name: FriendsOfCake/Search plugin
description: Search provides a searching/filter module for CakePHP applications.

name: Search plugin
description: Search plugin built on PRG pattern.

name: SphinxSearch plugin
description: Basic behaviour implementation for querying SphinxSearch indexes.

name: CipherBehavior plugin
description: Cipher your entities data with this behavior. Encryption is done at PHP level using CakePHP Security class.

name: Muffin/Throttle plugin
